title: (x) Thin slab serif - Serifa {JMC}
content:
hallo,   
   
may someone help, to identify this font!?   
it looks like URW Typewriter, but i'm not   
sure - the lowercase �s� seems more   
quadratic in the curves, and the dot of the   
lower �i� is a square.   
   
thank you   
 ![font-identification slab serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49027.jpg)
